What is Sacred Sprouts?

Sacred Sprouts is a family owned and operated business. We're focused on creating the next generation of versatile, economic, and robust diapers and other baby accessories for all the families of tomorrow.

Versatile

Find an All-in-One(AIO) cloth diaper for your newborn, or go with an AIO one-size-fits-most. Either way, all of our diapers are washer & dryer safe.
(Dispose of waste 1st!)

Economic

Whether you're in it for the environment, or to save money, cloth diapering is both healthy for Mother Nature and your piggy bank!

Robust

These diapers not only look great, but they work great too! Take them anywhere, anytime, AND to any-who, Easy to use, and with no pins, they're 100% safe. Everyone wins!

Made by Sacred Sprouts

Growing, one snap at a time.

Meet Sacred Sprouts

I founded Sacred Sprouts the summer of 2014. Since then I've come a long way! I couldn't have done it without the help of many others. Here are a few of them; they too have their own sets of talented skills!

Yvette Madison (Me)

Owner, Founder, and Mother

I began Sacred Sprouts (SS) after giving birth to my firstborn child, Gaia. My roots in seam-stressing are extended from my mother. She taught me when I was a child, and I have been doing it ever since! I started my first venture, SacredKin, in 2010.

Ve Butterfly

Seamstress / Grandmother

Ve is a seasoned seamstress, but her favorite skill shines as a leatherworker. When Ve isn't helping her daughter Yvette with overhead, you can find her spending quality time with her grandchilldren so Mom can get some work done.

Xopher Dee

Husband, Father and Webmaster

If Xopher isn't busy building websites, he can be found wrangling the children. His "family first" mentality can be seen as a foundation in everything he does.

Ashley Nicole

Assitant, Mother, and Toddler Tamer

Ashley has a knack for seeing things through and getting them done. She helps hold down the fort so Yvette can keep focused on producing quality work.

Don't just take my word for it!

I take pride in my passion, and I always make sure I create high quality products for all my customers. Here's what some of them have to say:

Natalya G.

(Yve) is AMAZING to work with! The BEST craftsmanship money can buy, LOVE the absorbency and trimness of the AIO OMMO and her Newborn AIO as well! DO BUSINESS HERE, you won't regret it!

Melissa C.

Sacred Sprouts diapers are my absolute favorite! The cutest patterns, totally customizable fabrics and snaps, great fit and absorbancy and no leaks! I own several pocket diapers and all in ones and they are extremely well crafted and definitely the diapers in my stash that I go to first. I'm ready for a pantsless Tucson summer so I can show off the cute fluff!

Brea H.

I adore working with Yvette from Sacred Sprouts for our cloth diapers. They truly are amazing! Fit perfect, never leak, the craftsmanship is impeccable! I have several of the OMMO AIO and they are the BEST diaper EVER!

Sacred Sprouts supports small businesses by always shopping locally when possible. Sacred Sprouts has taken all the necessary steps to create a safe and outstanding product. All of the items meet and exceed the CSPC’s standards for children’s clothing.
